-- 상위 30위권 콘텐츠의 파트너스 추천로직 노출 확인화
    SELECT CONCAT(year,'-',month,'-',day) day, channelname, rssoption, nid, count(*) as view
    FROM  elasticsearch_parquet
    WHERE 1=1
    AND    CONCAT(year,'-',month,'-',day)>='2022-07-26'  AND    CONCAT(year,'-',month,'-',day)<='2022-07-27'
    AND    type = 'PARTNERS_CONTENTS_IMPRESSION'
    AND    level in (60,61,65)
    AND    channelname  like '%유머%'
    AND    nid in (
    '2022072523444870638',
'2022072610311017713',
'2022072511004934667',
'2022072516000185622',
'2022072510032310435',
'2022072615043838632',
'2022072511550275804',
'2022072609170208206',
'2022072610000179293',
'2022072500222824294',
'2022072603000131084',
'2022072522000176343',
'2022072516304856586',
'2022072511072187161',
'2022072609350137440',
'2022072511444625492',
'2022072600040023839',
'2022072614591770984',
'2022072520273003419',
'2022072508450130900',
'2022072608000286196',
'2022072522111355015',
'2022072608000220622',
'2022072511253293475',
'2022072602353635280',
'2022072517141064329',
'2022072519324429432',
'2022072600270165708',
'2022072610470161319',
'2022072506031917769'
                    )
    GROUP BY CONCAT(year,'-',month,'-',day), channelname, rssoption, nid
